content.title: Local Filesystem Only
content.description: All file operations must be on the local filesystem. No network file systems, no remote storage during normal operation. This ensures determinism and security.

content.title: UTF-8 Encoding Requirement
content.description: All text files must use UTF-8 encoding. This ensures consistent character handling across platforms and prevents encoding-related bugs.

content.title: Runtime Memory Location
content.description: Runtime memory and data are stored in /home/user/maven/maven2_fix/brains/runtime_memory/. Domain banks, working memory, and persistent state live here. Source code is separate in maven2_fix/.
